title: U.S. - average salary for graduates , by discipline 2020
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories for the x axis representing Discipline, and a y axis representing Average salary in U.S. dollars.
The highest category is found at Computer_Science where Average salary in U.S. dollars is 79793.0.
The lowest category is found at Business where Average salary in U.S. dollars is 75197.0.
